column5: Good morning all, just turned on the news before heading out the door, and apparently there are lots of accidents already out there.  They say the roads are slick, and as usual take particular care on the ramps.  Guess I'll see how good my new tires are today  Play safe  Maureen
Hope you made it safe Maureen... Leah left for Ottawa at 6am heading across 12/7

Hey Wayne, safe trip down 12 to Oshawa and back, I guess all the slippery stuff was on the 400/401/404   I'm sure Leah had no problems at all.  I think we left around the same time, but she likely passed me when I made one of my 3 stops on the way down  Maureen
She made it fine! She knows the drill for winter driving... put it in 4 wheel drive and drive over anything that gets in your way! I taught her well ! LOL
